muclient.aliases:
<alias script="AddWarcry" match="warcry add (?P.*)" enabled="y" ignore_case="y" regexp="y" sequence="1" >
<alias script="RemoveWarcry" match="warcry delete (?P.*)" enabled="y" ignore_case="y" regexp="y" sequence="1" >
<alias script="EditWarcry" match="warcry edit (?P\S*) (?P.*)" enabled="y" ignore_case="y" regexp="y" sequence="1" >
muclient.script:
-- Turn the .warcries string to a table function WCsplit (string, separator) warcrytable = {} for str in string.gmatch(string, "[^"..separator.."]+") do table.insert (warcrytable, str) end return warcrytable end
-- Load the current warcry list to a table function WarcryToString (sName, sLine, wildcards) WClist = string.gsub(tostring (sLine),".warcries: ","") WCsplit(WClist,";") end
-- add to end of warcry table function AddWarcry (sName, sLine, wildcards)
if type(warcrytable) == 'table' then table.insert(warcrytable,wildcards.what) UpdateWarcry () ColourNote("orange","","You have added "..wildcards.what.." to your .warcries alias") else ColourNote("orange","","You need to import your warcry list first. Please type 'alias .warcries'.") end end
-- Edit a Warcry function EditWarcry (sName, sLine, wildcards) WarcryID = tonumber(wildcards.which) WarcryMSG = tostring(wildcards.what) if type(warcrytable) == 'table' then if warcrytable[WarcryID] == nil then ColourNote("orange","","Invalid selection") else ColourNote("orange","",warcrytable[WarcryID] .. " has been changed to " .. WarcryMSG ) warcrytable[WarcryID] = WarcryMSG UpdateWarcry () end else ColourNote("orange","","You need to import your warcry list first. Please type 'alias .warcries'.") end end
-- remove a warcry from the table function RemoveWarcry (sName, sLine, wildcards) WarcryID = tonumber(wildcards.what) if type(warcrytable) == 'table' then if warcrytable[WarcryID] == nil then ColourNote("orange","","Invalid selection") else ColourNote("orange","",wildcards.what .." "..warcrytable[WarcryID] .. " has been deleted.") table.remove(warcrytable,wildcards.what) UpdateWarcry () end else ColourNote("orange","","You need to import your warcry list first. Please type 'alias .warcries'.") end end
-- update .wacries alias in the mud function UpdateWarcry () warcrylist = "alias .warcries "
for k,v in pairs(warcrytable) do warcrylist = warcrylist .. v .. ";" end
warcrylist = warcrylist:sub(1, -2)
SendNoEcho(warcrylist) end
-- Display the contents of the warcry table function WarcryShowList () for k,v in pairs(warcrytable) do ColourNote("orange","",k.." "..v) end end
-- Update the warcry table from the mud function UpdateWarcry () SendNoEcho("alias .warcries") end
-- Help! function HelpWarcry ()
ColourNote("orange","","\"Warcry Update\" will pull you .warcries alias into the plugin. ") ColourNote("orange","","\"Warcry List\" will list your warcries. ") ColourNote("orange","","\"Warcry Add [warcry message]\" to add a new warcry. ") ColourNote("orange","","\"Warcry Delete [number]\" will delete the specified warcry from your list. ") ColourNote("orange","","\"Warcry Edit [number] [warcry message]\" changed the specified warcry to a different message.")
end
